name: BossBarHelper
description: The BossBarHelper class is a World Interaction helper in JsMacros that provides access to Minecraft boss bar information.
overview:
The BossBarHelper class is a World Interaction helper in JsMacros that provides access to Minecraft boss bar information. It allows scripts to inspect boss bar properties including names, progress percentages, colors, and styles. This is particularly useful for monitoring boss fights, health displays, and custom progress indicators that use Minecraft's boss bar system.

This class wraps around Minecraft's boss bar system and provides a scripting-friendly interface for interacting with boss bars that are currently displayed on the player's screen.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier (UUID) for this boss bar.

methods.name: getPercent
methods.description: Returns the current progress percentage of the boss bar (0.0 to 1.0).

methods.name: getColor
methods.description: Returns the color name of the boss bar.

methods.name: getStyle
methods.description: Returns the visual style of the boss bar.

methods.name: getColorValue
methods.description: Returns the numeric RGB color value of the boss bar, or -1 if the color doesn't have a specific value.

methods.name: getColorFormat
methods.description: Returns a FormattingHelper object representing the color format of the boss bar.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the boss bar as a TextHelper object.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this boss bar helper.
